product_name: Nite Ize Cargo Clip Case - Wide
long_description: The Nite Ize Cargo Clip Case-offered here in a wide size-keeps your gadget arsenal nigh, securing your phone and other items right at your side. Built from a tough nylon material that resists abrasion for lasting service. Stretch nylon side panels expand to accommodate various thicknesses of cell phones or other electronic devices. Strong, wide plastic clip secures to belts or webbing up to 2 in. wide; swivels 360deg for multiple carrying positions. Internal stretch-nylon loop secures a penlight, small multi-tool or pen. Tooth Ferry(TM) universal wireless hands-free headset holder features a convenient elastic pull tab to quickly dock or undock unit. Rip-and-stick flap closure secures phone or other items inside case to prevent loss during activity.
short_description: The Nite Ize Cargo Clip Case-offered here in a wide size-keeps your gadget arsenal nigh, securing your phone and other items right at your side.
